description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 11). Baan joins up with Giwaza when he rebels against Poseidal. Following the death of Wassan Lune, he is sent to Mizun to gather supporters for Giwaza`s rebellion. He pilots the Heavy Metal Ashura Temple.

Baan is killed in the final episode when battling Daba and Kyao.
name: Baan Gania Killas
